Articles.Content:
Hi, I was launching rockets today & noticed that my active ship has disappeared from the map. Everything else is there (projected orbit, apoapsis, periapsis, the symbols & orbits of other vessels, etc.) but the symbol for my spacecraft is AWOL.

Does anyone out there know how to possibly get it back?

Thanks!
Might want to mouse over the top-middle of the screen and check the visibility for craft types. If you turn off the display for the type of craft you're currently flying, its icon will disappear.

That was the issue... It somehow got kicked off.

Thanks for the assist, Vexx.
